31 March 2020

Cash4SMS Terms and Conditions changes

Dear Users! Please, pay attention to the information below.

Starting April 1, 2020, the following changes will be made to Cash4SMS Terms and Conditions.

Due to the changes in our contracts with mobile operators, you will receive 3 Eurocents instead of 4 Eurocents for each SMS.

However, we've got good news as well!

We are increasing the limit up to 1500 SMS per month instead of 1000! This way, your maximum income will increase up to 45 euros in one month instead of 40 euros, which you receive now! Happy earning!

Team Cash4SMS
